```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(dlookr)
```
### Load Data from Two TT Repo

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2021-03-16')
tt_games <- tuesdata$games
```
```{r}
dlookr::diagnose_numeric(tt_games)

dlookr::diagnose_category(tt_games)
```
```{r}
video_games <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-07-30/video_games.csv")
```
```{r}
dlookr::diagnose_numeric(video_games)

dlookr::diagnose_category(video_games)
```
